name: lederhosen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short leather trousers with braces (= a pair of straps to hold them up) attached, traditionally worn in parts of Germany and Austria: In Bavaria, the farmers really do wear lederhosen. Munich may be famous for Lederhosen and beer gardens, but the city is very hip.
More examplesFewer examplesThey were dressed in Bavarian peasant costume, complete with lederhosen, long socks, and dark green hats with feathers.It was great to see youngsters dressed in traditional Austrian lederhosen, proud of their heritage.Put on your Lederhosen and practise your Bavarian beer-drinking songs!Lederhosen have enjoyed a renaissance in recent years.
